name: G-RUN
description:
Welcome to something amazing. Something that has more advanced graphics than any mainstream game you have seen in the last 4 years COMBINED & TRIPLED. (haha joking)

Welcome to G-Run.

In this game, it's all about SPEED. It's all about ACCURACY. It's all about REFLEX. It's all about HAVING FUN, I GUESS.

WASD - move

Mouse - shoot

"Rocket" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Volatile Reaction" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
